trans-unit.source: Represents a button that opens a filter menu drop-down in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示開啟下拉式清單中的 [篩選] 功能表按鈕<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonFilterMenuButton"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonFilterMenuButton"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 當按下 KeyTip 或加速鍵時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonFilterMenuButton"></xref> when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: 建置的視覺化樹狀結構<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonFilterMenuButton"></xref>套用新的範本時。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the OnApplyTemplate method.
trans-unit.target: 每當應用程式程式碼或內部處理序，例如重建配置傳遞，呼叫 OnApplyTemplate 方法時，會叫用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlService.DismissPopup> attached event.

This method closes the filter menu drop-down and then marks the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlService.DismissPopup> attached event as handled so that the parent drop-down is not closed.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會關閉此篩選條件功能表下拉式清單，然後標記<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlService.DismissPopup>為已處理，讓不封閉的父下拉式清單，附加事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlService.DismissPopup>
